description:
Quotebook is where you collect quotes that matter. Curate, organize, and share the quotes from your library in an app designed for readability. Build your collection over time, and your favorite quotes will always be with you on all your devices.

• Add quotes seamlessly from life, books, and friends
• Discover more about the people and places that inspire you
• Share quotes with the people who matter, no matter where they are
• Tag and search quotes to find the perfect one when you need it most
• Collect quotes on your phone and they’ll be waiting at home on your iPad
releaseNotes:
Quotebook 3.0.3 fixes an issue where the iOS 8 migration spinner could continue indefinitely for those who were on a beta version or an older version of Quotebook on iOS 8.

NOTE: When choosing to use iCloud Drive during the iOS 8 update, a long migration occurs that moves iCloud data to iCloud Drive. Opening Quotebook during this time will display no quotes, but leaving the app open for a few minutes will allow the process to complete and your quotes will then display. We apologize for the inconvenience and have filed a bug report with Apple.

We love hearing from you, so if you need anything please send us an email at support@quotebookapp.com or mention us on Twitter at @quotebookapp. If you love us back, leave a review.
